text: Egh ia vaghvagh uan amuibar ikɨva deravɨra men gan. Egh Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir araziba ko a ifongezir arazibar amu.(4:4) Marazi ghaze, vezɨn kam kamaghɨn ghu: “Ia uan ifongiaba ko nɨghnɨzir kurar ian navir averiabar aven itiba, ia deraghvɨra da bagh uarir gan. Egh Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir araziba ko a ifongezir arazibar amu.”
